name: Robot War: Destroy Opponent
description:
Robot War: Destroy Opponent is a nonstop fighting shooting gun and crossfire robot battle game. Get it availed off yourself by beating down these legendary technological enemies in this top free action game if you want to challenge your human instincts. You will have to face various risks like sky diving right in the beginning. This is one of the most addictive superhero shooting in which you have to show your combating skills & tactics as a force warrior. Get ready for futuristic robot combat! Stay away from their malicious attacks for they have heavy weapons to shoot you down. Destroy the moving traffic to earn more points. You are an ultimate warrior of this incredible war so set an example for the next gen. You will attain the modern weaponry or inventory to get through success easily in this task.
Features:
- Robot vs Robot
- Weapons pickups
- Skydiving in starting of game
- Robot selection
-Traffic destruction to earn more points.
